Mobster's arm burnt, but that was alot of arm to have to burn off, it would
take longer than that. Mobster pulled back his fist and drove it towards
Necromancer's head...

----- Original Message -----
From: <cyberwolf4@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 09, 2001 12:49 AM
Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster


> Necromancer took a fierce shot to the head but kept a strong grip. he
> filled his mouth with searing hot flame intending to melt the arm off
> his opponent. another shot struck him so he swung his tail at the arm
> trying to stop the punches. while in so close he jabbed a claw at the
> alliance bots chest.
>
> -- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Mobstr felt someone's teeth sink in his left shoulder. He raised
> his right
> > arm and punched away at Necromancer's head...
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: <cyberwolf4@p...>
> > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > Sent: Tuesday, January 09, 2001 12:33 AM
> > Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
> >
> >
> > > Mobster use a tackle attack (Oh sorry wrong game.)
> > >
> > > Necromancer was taken to the ground by Mobsters attack, the ground
> > > shook as the titans wrested in the dirt. The momentum sent them
> > > rolling across the ground like a couple of schoolkids fighting on
> the
> > > playground. Necromancer sent his head forward snapping his jaws at
> > > the enemy bot trying to bite him in the left shoulder.
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > > > Mobster is hit and stunned, and then hit by every fireball. It
> > > angered him
> > > > to the point of no return. He charged Necromancer, lunging to
> knock
> > > him
> > > > over...
> > > >
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: <cyberwolf4@p...>
> > > > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > > > Sent: Tuesday, January 09, 2001 12:13 AM
> > > > Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > > Necromancer spins aroud when mobster pushes the tail away. He
> > > spreads
> > > > > his wings and swings them at Mobster. knowing that he's open
> for
> > > an
> > > > > attack he launches a series of six fireballs at the giant.
> > > starting
> > > > > with a shot at mobsters left arm he moves to the right
> shoulder
> > > and
> > > > > continues to alternate.
> > > > >
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > > > > > OOC: Just regular round lasers.
> > > > > >
> > > > > > BIC: Mobster moves his hands up and catches the tail,
> pushing
> > > the
> > > > > tail, hopefully out of the way...

> > > > > >   (What did he fire?  Is he still using his flamethrower?)
> > > > > >
> > > > > >   Necromancer continued to let his wings take the abuse, he
> rose
> > > > > his left wing up and blocked the shot. stress fractures
> continued
> > > to
> > > > > form as the abuse continued to take its tole. as he blocked he
> > > swung
> > > > > his tale around at Mobsters head.

> > > > > >     Mobster seen the ice blast coming, since this enemy has
> been
> > > > > firing them alot indeed. Mobster aimed Grenade's
> flamethrower, and
> > > > > managed to destroy the ice ball with it. Then the fireballs
> came.
> > > > > Mobster tried to switch to Kracken's ice gun, but too late,
> bang!
> > > > > Mobster slaps at himself to put the fire out. It does in fact,
> > > > > though, start to defrost his arm. Was he working on Gigas'
> brain?
> > > He
> > > > > must have been! He fired the flamethrower at his arm and
> melted
> > > the
> > > > > ice. He took the gun back in his left arm. Horn Drill had been
> > > known
> > > > > to be perfect at almost everything. Mobster aimed at
> Necromancer's
> > > > > head, and fired...

> > > the
